description: These bliss balls are the perfect afternoon snack for an energy boost and can be made in 10 minutes.
keywords: Bliss & protein ball,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Almond, Coconut & Vanilla Bliss Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place the walnuts in a food processor and blitz to a fine consistency.
Add the almond butter, dates, ginger and vanilla and pulse until smooth. Add a dash of water if the mix looks too dry.
With your hands, roll the dough into 9 even balls and place on the baking sheet. Place the desiccated coconut in a shallow dish roll the balls in the coconut to coat fully.
Eat at room temperature or place the tray in the fridge to firm up for 1020 minutes.
